thread.title: Quiet room central location
thread.title_full: Quiet room central location - Review of Novotel New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Margaret L
title: Quiet room central location
text: The Novatel hotel on 52nd Street Times Square was a nice place to stay. The room had modern fittings, very clean and a comfortable bed. It was a quiet room 1601 away from all the noise in the street. The luggage store came in handy for me. When walking about Times Square on Broadway it was easy to find the way home for the night by the big neon Novatel sign. Deli across the street cheaper for meals.
